Yes, definitely. Many bars and clubs in Graz offer a good selection of non-alcoholic drinks as well, so you can still enjoy the vibe without having to drink alcohol. Here are some recommendations with a variety of non-alcoholic drink options:

1. Bar Botanik - This trendy bar located in the city center offers a variety of non-alcoholic drinks, including freshly squeezed juices, smoothies, and non-alcoholic cocktails.

2. Cafe Kaiserfeld - This popular cafe and bar has a great selection of non-alcoholic drinks, including freshly roasted coffee, hot chocolate, and locally-produced soft drinks.

3. Kunsthauscafé - This cafe is located in Graz's Kunsthaus museum and offers a range of non-alcoholic drinks, including artisanal teas, gourmet hot chocolate, and freshly squeezed juices.

4. Kaffeehaus Helmut - This cozy cafe has a great selection of non-alcoholic drinks, including freshly brewed coffee, teas, and homemade lemonades.

5. Cafe Wasserturm - This cafe is located in a historic water tower and offers a variety of non-alcoholic drinks, including gourmet coffees, teas, and freshly squeezed juices.

I hope this helps and that you can still enjoy the atmosphere in Graz!
